divs: Sighting Detailson this night my wife and i were watching the night sky as we had patiently become accustom after three prior sightings we witnessed an oject enter the atmophere at a piont north by north west of our postion imediately it leveled moved accross the sky at a speed of what must have been at least 20000 mphit made a series of three curves as at the same time it seemmed to coolthe color upun entrywas as if the sun were comming out at night but as it performed the s curves it became darker it coereed the entire sky in a matter of 1 second then as to the west as we c ould see it shot straght toward the north at aspeed at least double of prior and out into space again
